title: 【A week of husband lunch boxes】#35 / Japanese BBQ Lunch

media:group.media:title: 【A week of husband lunch boxes】#35 / Japanese BBQ Lunch
media:group.media:description:
[ Contents ] 
🍱Tuesday /  Takoyaki, Tako fish sausage, broccoli & okra with tsuyu sauce

🍱Wednesday /  Deep-fried squid, greens, pickled ginger & plum (umebosi)

🍪Thursday /  Chocomushrooms

🍱Friday / Spicy & sweet red chicken, garlic bell pepper, fried bamboo shoot

🍱Saturday /  Salad rolls, fried salmon roll, seasoned kai lan

 🍖Sunday /  Japanese BBQ restaurant

----About  bento lunch box-----
[ Does my husband heat the bento or eat it cold? ]
He eats the bento at room temperature. That is natural things for us. but I know many people (also Japanese) wanna heat it. so I recommend you to use the lunch box that is fine for microwave, if you wanna heat it ;)
